function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Global spread of contagious diseases like COVID-19 in cities","Impact":"Severe impact on public health and city infrastructure","Mitigation":"Effective quarantine measures, public health education, and international cooperation","Technologies":"Contact tracing apps, temperature screening devices, and smart city infrastructure","People":"City residents, healthcare workers, and essential service providers","Owner":"Government authorities, public health agencies, and international organizations"}]}
